name: Reign Significant VR
description:
You wake up from a long unconscious state with an Ionizer Pistol lying right in front of you. Perhaps someone left it there for you? You barely remember the war, only slight images of deviled smiling faces and bullets flying past your head. That tool, you thought, was able to produce a wall with an immense amount of strength for you as well as defending your life with its sharp ionizing beam. You know what must be done. It's up to you decide the fate of the world inside of a small, fenced in facility. You wish yourself good luck and enter into battle.

Also, I had some help fixing up the core gameplay with KenLange, thanks for helping me with it mate!
